author: Dan Gallagher
title: No End in Sight for Amazon’s Wild Ride
text:
At this point, Amazon.com’s investors should probably get used to taking Jeff Bezos at his word.
The indefatigable CEO stopped appearing personally on Amazon’s quarterly earnings calls years ago, but he had a clear message for investors Thursday when the online retail giant posted record earnings along with a 38% jump in sales for the fourth quarter. Writing of the strong success of his company’s voice-activated digital assistant technology called Alexa, Mr. Bezos noted in the company’s release: “We don’t see positive surprises... RELATED VIDEO Is Amazon Going to Rule the World? Amazon wants to deliver everything you want to your doorstep, anywhere in the world. But the e-commerce giant faces several challenges in its pursuit of a global empire. WSJ's Karan Deep Singh breaks down the basics with the help of an Amazon delivery box.
